overall_goal: Peel and collect garlic and onion in bowls.

clips.subgoal: Remove the outer cover of garlic and place the peeled garlic in a dish.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Remove the outer cover of the garlic and put it in the dish.

clips.subgoal: Peel garlic and place it into a bowl.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Peel garlic and place it in a bowl.
Pick garlic from the cooking pot, peel it, and drop it into a bowl.
Peel garlic with hands and put it in a bowl.
Peel garlic into a container and drop the garlic in.
Sort through husks and find garlic clove, then peel and drop it into a container.
